eosdxanalysis.models.curve_fitting.GaussianDecomposition#

class eosdxanalysis.models.curve_fitting.GaussianDecomposition(image, params_init_method='estimation', fitting_params=None, p0_dict=None, p_lower_bounds_dict=None, p_upper_bounds_dict=None)#

Class for decomposing keratin diffraction patterns as a sum of Gaussians with angular spread.

Methods

best_fit()

Use scipy.optimize.curve_fit to decompose a keratin diffraction pattern into a sum of Gaussians with angular spread.

estimate_arc_angle_5A(image, ...)

Estimate the 5A maxima arc angle, related to the plateau size

estimate_arc_angle_9A(image, ...)

Estimate the 9A maxima arc angle, related to the plateau size

estimate_parameters([width, position_tol])

Estimate Gaussian fit parameters based on provided image.

estimate_peak_amplitude_5A(image, ...)

Estimate the 5A peak amplitude

estimate_peak_amplitude_9A(image, ...)

Estimate the 9A peak amplitude

estimate_peak_location_radius_5A(image, ...)

Estimate the 5A peak using the intensity difference which isolates the anisotropic 5A peak

estimate_peak_location_radius_5_4A(image, ...)

Estimates the 5-4A peak distance from the center

estimate_peak_location_radius_9A(image, ...)

Estimate the 9A peak distance from the center

estimate_peak_std_5A(image, ...)

Estimate the 5A peak widths (full-width at half maximum)

estimate_peak_std_5_4A(image, ...)

Estimate the 5_4A peak widths (full-width at half maximum)

estimate_peak_std_9A(image, ...)

Estimate the 9A peak widths (full-width at half maximum)

estimate_rotation_angle(image)

Estimates rotation angle using skimage.transform.warp_polar to find the direction with the highest intensity

feature_list()

Returns the list of feature names

fit_error(image, fit)

Returns the square error between a function and its approximation.

ideal_parameters()

Returns ideal parameters from literature

objective(p, image, r, theta)

Generate a keratin diffraction pattern with the given parameters list p and return the fit error

parameter_init([params_init_method, ...])

Initialize parameter estimates for curve fitting optimization

parameter_list()

Returns the list of parameter names
